msg: fixes to make OS390PlatformUtils.cpp compile.  Thanks to Steve Dulin.

author: neilg
msg: document seg fault that can be provoked by calling XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate from within a catch block.

author: neilg
msg: fix segmentation faults that may arise when the parser throws exceptions during document parsing.  In general, XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate() should not be called from within a catch statement.
